page.title: 14HOW WE USE THE LAND
page.content: As we said in the opening page this is a rural area and almost all of the land is in the form of farms. The farming is mixed and the crops grown change from year to year. Among the crops you would see are: Oilseed Rape,Potatoes,Cereal Crops, Root Crops and Grassland for Sheep and Cattle. In spite of all the farmland it does not give a lot of employment in the area. Machines have taken over from people and quite a lot of the farm cottages are let to people who do not work on the farm.
